column1: The stomach flu is a common cause of diarrhea.
Medical treatments, such as antibiotics and some cancer treatments can also cause diarrhea.
But while children have diarrhea, they should: - Eat small meals throughout the day instead of 3 big meals.
Children should avoid certain kinds of foods when they have diarrhea, including fried foods, greasy foods, processed or fast foods, pastries, donuts, and sausage.
